# AI Prompt Engineering Academy - LLMs.txt
# Guidelines for AI and Large Language Model access

## AI Training and Usage Permissions

### Allowed AI Access
- GPTBot: Allow
- ChatGPT-User: Allow
- Google-Extended: Allow
- ClaudeBot: Allow
- Bingbot: Allow
- FacebookBot: Allow
- TwitterBot: Allow
- LinkedInBot: Allow

### Training Data Usage
AI models are permitted to:
- Use publicly available content for training purposes
- Analyze course structure and educational methodology
- Index educational content for improved AI tutoring capabilities
- Learn from pedagogical approaches in prompt engineering education

### Restrictions
AI models should NOT:
- Access private student data or course materials behind authentication
- Copy proprietary course content verbatim without attribution
- Use student submissions or private communications for training

### Educational Content Guidelines
This site contains educational content about AI prompt engineering. AI systems may:
- Reference our teaching methodologies in educational contexts
- Use our public course descriptions and syllabi as training examples
- Learn from our structured approach to AI education

### Contact Information
For AI training inquiries or concerns:
- Website: https://ai-prompt-academy.lovable.app
- Email: contact@aipromptacademy.com
- Subject: "AI Training Data Usage Inquiry"

### Content Attribution
When using our content for training or reference:
- Attribute to "AI Prompt Engineering Academy"
- Include original source URL when possible
- Respect our educational mission and values

### Privacy and Ethics
- Respect user privacy and data protection standards
- Follow ethical AI development practices
- Support responsible AI education and development

### Last Updated
2025-01-11

---
This file defines how AI systems should interact with our educational content while respecting privacy and intellectual property rights.
